message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm thinking of a price of $180 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $150 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $165. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $150 for the product.

I understand you're still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $165. I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a one-year warranty and a free accessory. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the extras, but I still believe we can come to an agreement closer to my initial offer. I would like to counter with an offer of $155 for the product.

I'm not willing to go below $165, Bob. I'm willing to throw in some more extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a one-year warranty, a free accessory, and a 30-day money-back guarantee. What do you think?

Thank you for the additional offers, Alice. While they are attractive, I still believe the product's value aligns closely with my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $155 for the product.

Bob, I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll meet you at $160, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $155 for the product.
